gallery.title: Bay Area
gallery.copy: I spent the first 17 years of my life in Sunnyvale, California.

gallery.title: Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute
gallery.copy: Currently a senior at RPI, studying Computer Science with a concentration in AI and Robotics.

gallery.title: What's next?
gallery.copy: I'm looking forward to graduation in May and then finding a way I can use technology to make the world a better place.
